Title: Relates to the administration of the statewide central register of child abuse and maltreatment
Summary: Requires a caller making a report of suspected child abuse or maltreatment to the central registry to leave their name and contact information; prohibits the office of children and family services from releasing information identifying a person who made such a report.
LawCode: Amd ยง422, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the administration of the statewide central register of child abuse and maltreatment
